recipe.title: Arugula Salsa Verde
ingredients: Finely grated zest of 1 small lemon
3/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil plus more
instructions: Mix tomatoes, lemon zest, garlic, arugula, breadcrumbs, capers, and vinegar in a small bowl. Using a wooden spoon, slowly mix in 3/4 cup oil, then Parmesan. Pour a little oil on surface to keep salsa from discoloring.
